tool_description: Get OAuth/OpenID Connect authentication information. This service provides OpenID Connect authentication information retrieval.

api_list.name: OpenID Connecter
api_list.description: This API retrieves OAuth/OpenID Connect (OIDC) authentication information from third-party providers such as Google, LINE, YahooJP, and Azure. You can obtain an OIDC list without an OAuthCode or OIDC authentication information with an OAuthCode. If you receive an OIDC list, you can select an OAuthURL to call and obtain the corresponding authentication information. The parameters redirectHost and redirectPort are not required for this call.

optional_parameters.name: oAuthCode
optional_parameters.description: OIDC Provider Code (e.g., GoogleOIDC, LineOIDC, YahooJPOIDC)

optional_parameters.name: redirectHost
optional_parameters.description: Host to redirect to after authentication (not required)

optional_parameters.name: redirectPort
optional_parameters.description: Port to redirect to after authentication (not required)
